detailedDescription.articleBody: Charles Cody "Chuck" Huber is an American voice actor, ADR director and ADR script writer primarily known for his work for Funimation and OkraTron 5000. He has provided numerous voices for Japanese anime series and video games. He is best known for his anime dub roles of Hiei from Yu Yu Hakusho, Dr. Franken Stein from Soul Eater, and Android 17 and Pilaf from Dragon Ball Z.
